segments.text: Royal Hotel , can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I urgently need a room for tomorrow night , and do you have any vacancies ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we have . What kind of room would you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like a suite with an ocean view , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem , sir .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is the price of the suite ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is $ 200 per night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is a little high . I'm told that your hotel is offering discount now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but the offer ended yesterday . I'm sorry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see . Then do you have anything less expensive ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , sir . So far it is the least expensive suite for tomorrow night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I will take it . By the way , does the price include breakfast ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it does . Now could I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My name is David White .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you kindly spell it for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is D-A-V-I-D , W-H-I-T-E .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , I got it . And how long do you expect to stay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About three days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Our check-in time is after 12:00 . And see you tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . See you .
segments.speaker: S2
